member.name: T:Clover.RemotePay.CloverEventConnector
member.summary:
Clover Connector and Clover Connector Listener wrapper for easy .NET event consumption of standard Clover API. This is an alternate access Ease of Use layer wrapping the standard Clover Connector API for designs that would prefer to consume an Event model API.
Standard CloverConnector API calls are made to this object The single Message event can be subscribed to for a central message handler design. All messages raise the common Message event. Individual response events can be subscribed to in order to handle specific messages. All messages raise their own custom event.

member.name: M:Clover.RemotePay.CloverEventConnector.#ctor
member.summary: Create an empty CloverEventConnector Attach an existing ICloverConnector object or create a new on to use this CloverEventConnector

member.name: M:Clover.RemotePay.CloverEventConnector.#ctor(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector)
member.summary: Construct a CloverEventConnector from an existing CloverConnector object that has already been setup
member.param: Existing CloverConnector SDK object managed by the POS

member.name: M:Clover.RemotePay.CloverEventConnector.Attach(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector)
member.summary: Attach an existing CloverConnector to this CloverEventConnector as the one and only CloverConnector SDK object

member.name: E:Clover.RemotePay.CloverEventConnector.Message
member.summary: Catch-all event signal raised by every ICloverConnectorListener handler in addition to their custom event to enable a central Message Handling pattern The Message event is raised after the custom event, and you may set the CloverEventArgs.handled flag if you wish to do either/or message processing

member.name: E:Clover.RemotePay.CloverEventConnector.DeviceActivityStart
member.summary: Device Activity message - UI screen has changed and is being shown

member.name: E:Clover.RemotePay.CloverEventConnector.DeviceActivityEnd
member.summary: Device Activity message - UI screen is changing and current screen is being hidden

member.name: E:Clover.RemotePay.CloverEventConnector.DeviceError
member.summary: There was an error from the device or SDK layer, usually directly related to the last call

member.summary: Increment PreAuth call has completed with these details (success or failure)

member.name: E:Clover.RemotePay.CloverEventConnector.VerifySignatureRequest
member.summary: The customer has signed for the payment, the POS needs to confirm the signature so the payment can continue (eg Cashier compares signature to card as appropriate)

member.name: E:Clover.RemotePay.CloverEventConnector.ConfirmPaymentRequest
member.summary: The payment was detected as a possible duplicate or the device is offline, the POS needs to confirm the payment is acceptable to continue (eg Cashier confirms it isn't a duplicate payment and should be processed)

member.summary: Base class for all CloverConnectorListener event messages

member.name: P:Clover.RemotePay.CloverEventArgs.cloverMessage
member.summary: The actual Clover ICloverConnectorLisener callback method that raised this event. Especially usful when using the central Message Handler pattern.

member.name: P:Clover.RemotePay.CloverEventArgs.cloverConnector
member.summary: The ICloverConnector object associated with this ICloverConnectorListener event message (ie the device SDK object that sent this message)

member.name: P:Clover.RemotePay.CloverEventArgs.Handled
member.summary: Flag to allow user code to specify whether it handled this message already when consuming both specific API and the catch-all Message events. This value is always ignored by the SDK

member.summary: All the possible Clover Connector Listener message names as a reference enum

member.name: T:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloverConnectorFactory
member.summary: Factory to create an instance of the CloverConnector.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloverConnectorFactory.createICloverConnector(com.clover.remotepay.transport.CloverDeviceConfiguration)
member.summary: Factory to create an instance of the CloverConnector
member.param: Object that conveys the required information used by the connector. Usually a USBCloverDeviceConfiguration (USB connection) or WebSocketCloverDeviceConfiguration (Network/SNPD connection)
member.returns: Initialized instance conforming to the ICloverConnector

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloverConnectorFactory.CreateUsbConnector(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create a USB configured connection CloverConnector to a Clover Device running USB Pay Display (UsbPD) Convenience wrapper around creating a USBCloverDeviceConfiguration object and calling CloverConnectorFactory.createICloverConnector
member.param: Application ID for server reporting
Point of Sale name for server reporting
Station ID / serial number for server reporting
Turn logging on or off

member.summary: Create a WebSockect configured connection CloverConnector to a Clover Device running Secure Network Pay Display (SNPD) Convenience wrapper around creating a WebSocketCloverDeviceConfiguration object and calling CloverConnectorFactory.createICloverConnector
member.param: Clover Device Secure Network Pay Display (SNPD) network address, usually similar to "https://192.168.0.1:1234/remote_pay"
Application ID for server reporting
Point of Sale name for server reporting
Station ID / serial number for server reporting
Previous paired auth token to allow quick reconnection without initiating antoerh pairing. Blank value, invalid or expired token will initiate a new pairing
Delegate method called with temporary pairing code to enter on device, like `6341` - display to user to enter on Clover Device to complete pairing
Delegate method called with reconnection auth token when pairing has succeeded
Delegate method called during pairing flow transitions
Turn logging on or off

member.summary: Auth method to obtain an Auth. While a Pre-Auth can also be accomplished by setting the IsPreAuth flag to true, the PreAuthRequest is the preferred request type. PreAuth functionality was retained for backward compatibility

member.summary: Register to receive customer data with the Clover Loyalty API

member.summary: Set the Loyalty API's current customer info

member.name: T:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener
member.summary: These are the methods to implement for intercepting messages that are sent from a Clover device.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnDeviceActivityStart(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloverDeviceEvent)
member.summary: Called when the Clover device transitions to a new screen or activity. The CloverDeviceEvent passed in will contain an event type, a description, and a list of available InputOptions.
member.param: The CloverDeviceEvent event.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnDeviceActivityEnd(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloverDeviceEvent)
member.summary: Called when the Clover device transitions away from a screen or activity. The CloverDeviceEvent passed in will contain an event type and description. Note: The start and end events are not guaranteed to process in order. The event type should be used to make sure these events are paired.
member.param: The CloverDeviceEvent event.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnDeviceError(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloverDeviceErrorEvent)
member.summary: Called when an error occurs while trying to send messages to the Clover device.
member.param: The CloverDeviceErrorEvent event.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnPreAuthResponse(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.PreAuthResponse)
member.summary: Called in response to a PreAuth() request. Note: The boolean IsPreAuth flag in the PreAuthResponse indicates whether CapturePreAuth() can be called for the returned Payment. If the IsPreAuth flag is false and the IsAuth flag is true, then the payment gateway coerced the PreAuth() request to an Auth. The payment will need to be voided or it will be automatically captured at closeout.
member.param: The PreAuthResponse details.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnAuthResponse(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.AuthResponse)
member.summary: Called in response to an Auth() request. Note: An Auth transaction may come back as a final Sale, depending on the payment gateway. The AuthResponse has a boolean IsAuth flag that indicates whether the Payment can still be tip-adjusted.
member.param: The AuthResponse to the transaction request.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnTipAdjustAuthResponse(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.TipAdjustAuthResponse)
member.summary: Called in response to a tip adjustment for an Auth transaction. Contains the TipAmount if successful.
member.param: The TipAdjustAuthResponse to the transaction request.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnCapturePreAuthResponse(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CapturePreAuthResponse)
member.summary: Called in response to a CapturePreAuth() request. Contains the new Amount and TipAmount if successful.
member.param: The CapturePreAuthResponse to the transaction request.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnIncrementPreAuthResponse(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.IncrementPreAuthResponse)
member.summary: Called in response to an IncrementPreAuth() request. Contains the authorization if successful.
member.param: The IncrementPreAuthResponse to the transaction

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnVerifySignatureRequest(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.VerifySignatureRequest)
member.summary: Called when the Clover device requests verification for a user's on-screen signature. The Payment and Signature will be passed in.
member.param: The VerifySignatureRequest.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnConfirmPaymentRequest(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ConfirmPaymentRequest)
member.summary:
Called when the Clover device encounters a Challenge at the payment gateway and requires confirmation. A Challenge is triggered by a potential duplicate Payment (DUPLICATE_CHALLENGE) or an offline Payment (OFFLINE_CHALLENGE). The device sends an OnConfirmPaymentRequest() asking the merchant to reply by sending either an AcceptPayment() or RejectPayment() call.
Note: Duplicate Payment Challenges are raised when multiple Payments are made with the same card type and last four digits within the same hour. For this reason, we recommend that you do not programmatically call CloverConnector.RejectPayment() on all instances of DUPLICATE_CHALLENGE. For more information, see {@link https://docs.clover.com/build/working-with-challenges/|Working with Challenges}.
member.param: The ConfirmPaymentRequest for confirmation.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnCloseoutResponse(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloseoutResponse)
member.summary: Called in response to a Closeout() request.
member.param: The CloseoutResponse details for the transaction request.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnSaleResponse(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.SaleResponse)
member.summary: Called at the completion of a Sale() request. The SaleResponse contains a {@see com.clover.remote.client.messages.ResultCode} and a Success boolean. A successful Sale transaction will also have the Payment object, which can be for the full or partial amount of the Sale request. Note: A Sale transaction my come back as a tip-adjustable Auth, depending on the payment gateway. The SaleResponse has a boolean IsSale flag that indicates whether the Sale is final, or will be finalized during closeout.
member.param: The SaleResponse details for the transaction request.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnManualRefundResponse(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ManualRefundResponse)
member.summary: Called in response to a ManualRefund() request. Contains a {@see com.clover.remote.client.messages.ResultCode} and a Success boolean. If successful, the ManualRefundResponse will have a Credit object associated with the relevant Payment information.
member.param: The ManualRefundResponse details for the transaction request.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnRefundPaymentResponse(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.RefundPaymentResponse)
member.summary: Called in response to a RefundPayment() request. Contains a {@see com.clover.remote.client.messages.ResultCode} and a Success boolean. The response to a successful transaction will contain the Refund, which includes the original paymentId as a reference.
member.param: The RefundPaymentResponse details for the transaction request.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnVoidPaymentRefundResponse(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.VoidPaymentRefundResponse)
member.summary: Called in response to a VoidPaymentRefund() request with results.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnTipAdded(com.clover.remotepay.transport.TipAddedMessage)
member.summary: Called when a customer selects a tip amount on the Clover device's screen.
member.param: The TipAddedMessage.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnVoidPaymentResponse(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.VoidPaymentResponse)
member.summary: Called in response to a VoidPayment() request. Contains a {@see com.clover.remote.client.messages.ResultCode} and a Success boolean. If successful, the response will also contain the paymentId for the voided Payment.
member.param: The VoidPaymentResponse details for the transaction request.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnDeviceConnected
member.summary: Called when the Clover device is initially connected, but not ready to communicate.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnDeviceReady(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.MerchantInfo)
member.summary: Called when the Clover device is ready to communicate and respond to requests.
member.param: The MerchantInfo details to associate with the device.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnDeviceDisconnected
member.summary: Called when the Clover device is disconnected from the CloverConnector or not responding.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnVaultCardResponse(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.VaultCardResponse)
member.summary: Called in response to a VaultCard() request. Contains a {@see com.clover.remote.client.messages.ResultCode} and a Success boolean. If successful, the response will contain a VaultedCard object with a token value that's unique for the card and merchant. The token can be used for future Sale() and Auth() requests.
member.param: The VaultCardResponse details for the request.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnRetrievePendingPaymentsResponse(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.RetrievePendingPaymentsResponse)
member.summary: Called in response to a RetrievePendingPayment() request.
member.param: The RetrievePendingPaymentsResponse details for the request.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnReadCardDataResponse(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ReadCardDataResponse)
member.summary: Called in response to a ReadCardData() request. Contains card information (specifically Track 1 and Track 2 card data).
member.param: The ReadCardDataResponse details for the request.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnPrintManualRefundReceipt(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.PrintManualRefundReceiptMessage)
member.summary: Called when a user requests a paper receipt for a Manual Refund. Will only be called if DisablePrinting = true on the ManualRefund() request.
member.param: A callback that asks the POS to print a receipt for a ManualRefund. Contains a Credit object.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnPrintManualRefundDeclineReceipt(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.PrintManualRefundDeclineReceiptMessage)
member.summary: Called when a user requests a paper receipt for a declined Manual Refund. Will only be called if DisablePrinting = true on the ManualRefund() request.
member.param: The PrintManualRefundDeclineReceiptMessage.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnPrintPaymentReceipt(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.PrintPaymentReceiptMessage)
member.summary: Called when a user requests a paper receipt for a Payment. Will only be called if DisablePrinting = true on the Sale(), Auth(), or PreAuth() request.
member.param: The PrintPaymentReceiptMessage details.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnPrintPaymentDeclineReceipt(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.PrintPaymentDeclineReceiptMessage)
member.summary: Called when a user requests a paper receipt for a declined Payment. Will only be called if DisablePrinting = true on the Sale(), Auth(), or PreAuth() request.
member.param: The PrintPaymentDeclineReceiptMessage details.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnPrintPaymentMerchantCopyReceipt(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.PrintPaymentMerchantCopyReceiptMessage)
member.summary: Called when a user requests a merchant copy of a Payment receipt. Will only be called if DisablePrinting = true on the Sale(), Auth(), or PreAuth() request.
member.param: The PrintPaymentMerchantCopyReceiptMessage details.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnPrintRefundPaymentReceipt(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.PrintRefundPaymentReceiptMessage)
member.summary: Called when a user requests a paper receipt for a Payment Refund. Will only be called if DisablePrinting = true on the Sale(), Auth(), PreAuth() or ManualRefund() request.
member.param: The PrintRefundPaymentReceiptMessage details.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnPrintJobStatusResponse(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.PrintJobStatusResponse)
member.summary: Called in response to a RetrievePrintJobStatus() request.
member.param: The PrintJobStatusResponse details for the request.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnRetrievePrintersResponse(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.RetrievePrintersResponse)
member.summary: Called in response to a RetrievePrinters() request.
member.param: The RetrievePrintersResponse details for the request.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnCustomActivityResponse(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CustomActivityResponse)
member.summary: Called when a Custom Activity finishes normally.
member.param: The CustomActivityResponse.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnRetrieveDeviceStatusResponse(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.RetrieveDeviceStatusResponse)
member.summary: Called in response to a RetrieveDeviceStatus() request.
member.param: The RetrieveDeviceStatusResponse details for the request.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnMessageFromActivity(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.MessageFromActivity)
member.summary: Called when a Custom Activity sends a message to the POS.
member.param: The MessageFromActivity details.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnResetDeviceResponse(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ResetDeviceResponse)
member.summary: Called in response to a ResetDevice() request.
member.param: The ResetDeviceResponse details for the request.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnRetrievePaymentResponse(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.RetrievePaymentResponse)
member.summary: Called in response to a RetrievePayment() request.
member.param: The RetrievePaymentResponse details for the request.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnPrintJobStatusRequest(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.PrintJobStatusRequest)
member.summary: Called in response to a RetrievePrintJobStatus() request.
member.param: The PrintJobStatusResponse details for the request.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnDisplayReceiptOptionsResponse(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.DisplayReceiptOptionsResponse)
member.summary: Called in response to a DisplayReceiptOptions request.
member.param: The DisplayReceiptOptionsResponse details for the response.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnInvalidStateTransitionResponse(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.InvalidStateTransitionNotification)
member.summary: Called to notify the Point of Sale that a call was invalid in the current context or an internal state change failed.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener.OnCustomerProvidedData(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CustomerProvidedDataEvent)
member.summary: Called when Loyalty API sends customer identifying data for a loyalty data type subscribed to in CloverConnector.RegisterForCustomerProvidedData()
member.param: The CustomerProvidedDataEvent containing type and data payload, like PHONE, 555-1212 in type-specific custom encoding

member.name: T:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.DefaultCloverConnectorListener
member.summary:
This is a default implementation of the ICloverConnectorListener that can be used for quickly creating applications by simply overriding the appropriate listener method(s) needed for testing a particular remote call.
Also see the CloverEventConnector for another option to receive events instead of overriding the class and receiving method calls

member.name: T:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector
member.summary: The CloverConnector API serves as the interface for connecting to a Clover device. This document defines the available methods.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.InitializeConnection
member.summary: Initializes the connection and starts communication with the Clover device. This method is called after the connector has been created and listeners have been added to it. It must be called before any other method (other than those that add or remove listeners).

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.AddCloverConnectorListener(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener)
member.summary: Adds a Clover Connector listener.
member.param: The connection listener.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.RemoveCloverConnectorListener(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnectorListener)
member.summary: Removes a Clover Connector listener.
member.param: The connection listener.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.Sale(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.SaleRequest)
member.summary: Requests a Sale transaction (purchase).
member.param: A SaleRequest object containing basic information needed for the transaction.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.AcceptSignature(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.VerifySignatureRequest)
member.summary: If a signature is captured during a transaction, this method accepts the signature as entered.
member.param: The accepted VerifySignatureRequest the device passed to OnVerifySignatureRequest().

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.RejectSignature(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.VerifySignatureRequest)
member.summary: If a signature is captured during a transaction, this method rejects the signature as entered.
member.param: The rejected VerifySignatureRequest the device passed to OnVerifySignatureRequest().

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.AcceptPayment(com.clover.sdk.v3.payments.Payment)
member.summary: If Payment confirmation is required during a transaction due to a Challenge, this method accepts the Payment. A Challenge may be triggered by a potential duplicate Payment or an offline Payment.
member.param: The Payment to accept.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.RejectPayment(com.clover.sdk.v3.payments.Payment,com.clover.remotepay.transport.Challenge)
member.summary: If Payment confirmation is required during a transaction due to a Challenge, this method rejects the Payment. A Challenge may be triggered by a potential duplicate Payment or an offline Payment.
member.param: The Payment to accept.
The Challenge that resulted in Payment rejection.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.Auth(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.AuthRequest)
member.summary: Requests an Auth transaction. The tip for an Auth can be adjusted through the TipAdjustAuth() call until the batch Closeout is processed.
member.param: The AuthRequest details.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.PreAuth(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.PreAuthRequest)
member.summary: Initiates a PreAuth transaction (a pre-authorization for a certain amount). This transaction lets the merchant know whether the account associated with a card has sufficient funds, without actually charging the card. When the merchant is ready to charge a final amount, the POS will call CapturePreAuth() to complete the Payment.
member.param: The PreAuthRequest details.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.CapturePreAuth(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CapturePreAuthRequest)
member.summary: Marks a PreAuth Payment for capture by a Closeout process. After a PreAuth is captured, it is effectively the same as an Auth Payment. Note: Should only be called if the request's PaymentID is from a PreAuthResponse.
member.param: The CapturePreAuthRequest details.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.IncrementPreAuth(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.IncrementPreAuthRequest)
member.summary: Increments the amount of a previous PreAuth Payment. Note: Should only be called if the request's PaymentID is from a PreAuthResponse.
member.param: The IncrementPreAuthRequest details.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.TipAdjustAuth(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.TipAdjustAuthRequest)
member.summary: Adjusts the tip for a previous Auth transaction. This call can be made until the Auth Payment has been finalized by a Closeout. Note: Should only be called if the request's PaymentID is from an AuthResponse.
member.param: The TipAdjustAuthRequest details.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.VoidPayment(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.VoidPaymentRequest)
member.summary: Voids a transaction.
member.param: A VoidRequest object containing basic information needed to void the transaction.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.RefundPayment(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.RefundPaymentRequest)
member.summary: Refunds the full or partial amount of a Payment.
member.param: The RefundPaymentRequest details.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.ManualRefund(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ManualRefundRequest)
member.summary: Initiates a Manual Refund transaction (a Refund or credit that is not associated with a previous Payment).
member.param: A ManualRefundRequest object with the request details.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.VaultCard(System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Asks the Clover device to capture card information and request a payment token from the payment gateway. The payment token can be used for future Sale and Auth requests in place of the card details. Note: The merchant account must be configured to allow payment tokens.
member.param: The card entry methods allowed to capture the payment token. If this parameter is null, the default values (CARD_ENTRY_METHOD_MAG_STRIPE, CARD_ENTRY_METHOD_ICC_CONTACT, and CARD_ENTRY_METHOD_NFC_CONTACTLESS) will be used.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.ReadCardData(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ReadCardDataRequest)
member.summary: Requests card information (specifically Track 1 and Track 2 card data).
member.param: The ReadCardDataRequest details.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.Closeout(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloseoutRequest)
member.summary: Sends a request to the Clover server to close out all transactions. Note: The merchant account must be configured to allow transaction closeout.
member.param: The CloseoutRequest details.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.ResetDevice
member.summary: Sends a request to reset the Clover device back to the welcome screen. Can be used when the device is in an unknown or invalid state from the perspective of the POS. Note: This request could cause the POS to miss a transaction or other information. Use cautiously as a last resort.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.ShowMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Displays a string-based message on the Clover device's screen.
member.param: The string message to display.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.ShowWelcomeScreen
member.summary: Displays the welcome screen on the Clover device.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.ShowThankYouScreen
member.summary: Displays the thank you screen on the Clover device.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.DisplayPaymentReceiptOptions(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.DisplayPaymentReceiptOptionsRequest)
member.summary: Displays the customer-facing receipt options (print, email, etc.) for a Payment on the Clover device.
member.param: The request with payment IDs, etc., to locate the receipt

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.OpenCashDrawer(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.OpenCashDrawerRequest)
member.summary: Opens the first cash drawer found connected to the Clover device. The reason for opening the cash drawer must be provided.
member.param: Request with text specifying the reason for opening the cash drawer.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.ShowDisplayOrder(com.clover.remote.order.DisplayOrder)
member.summary: Displays an Order and associated line items on the Clover device. Will replace an Order that is already displayed on the device screen.
member.param: The DisplayOrder to display.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.RemoveDisplayOrder(com.clover.remote.order.DisplayOrder)
member.summary: Removes the DisplayOrder object from the Clover device's screen.
member.param: The DisplayOrder to remove.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the connection to the Clover device. After this is called, the connection to the device is severed, and the CloverConnector object is no longer usable. Instantiate a new CloverConnector object in order to call InitializeConnection().

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.InvokeInputOption(com.clover.remotepay.transport.InputOption)
member.summary: Sends a keystroke to the Clover device that invokes an input option (OK, CANCEL, DONE, etc.) on the customer's behalf. InputOptions are on the CloverDeviceEvent passed to OnDeviceActivityStart().
member.param: The input option to invoke.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.Print(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.PrintRequest)
member.summary: Sends a print request using the PrintRequest object. Used to print text, Bitmap image objects, and images from URLs using the specified printer.
member.param: The PrintRequest details.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.RetrievePrinters(com.clover.remotepay.transport.RetrievePrintersRequest)
member.summary: Queries available printers attached to the Clover device using the RetrievePrintersRequest object.
member.param: The RetrievePrintersRequest details.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.RetrievePrintJobStatus(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.PrintJobStatusRequest)
member.summary: Queries the status of a print job using the PrintJobStatusRequest object.
member.param: The PrintJobStatusRequest details.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.RetrievePendingPayments
member.summary: Retrieves a list of unprocessed Payments that were taken offline and are pending submission to the server.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.StartCustomActivity(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CustomActivityRequest)
member.summary: Starts a Custom Activity on the Clover device. Note: The Custom Activity must already be set up and configured on the Clover device.
member.param: The CustomActivityRequest details.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.SendMessageToActivity(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.MessageToActivity)
member.summary: Sends a message to a Custom Activity running on a Clover device.
member.param: The MessageToActivity details to send to the Custom Activity.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.RetrieveDeviceStatus(com.clover.remotepay.transport.RetrieveDeviceStatusRequest)
member.summary: Sends a message requesting the current status of the Clover device.
member.param: The RetrieveDeviceStatusRequest details.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.RetrievePayment(com.clover.remotepay.transport.RetrievePaymentRequest)
member.summary: Requests the Payment information associated with the externalPaymentId passed in. Only valid for Payments made in the past 24 hours on the Clover device queried.
member.param: The RetrievePaymentRequest details.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.DisplayReceiptOptions(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.DisplayReceiptOptionsRequest)
member.summary: Display receipt options for a Credit, Refund, or Payment
member.param: The DisplayReceiptOptionsRequest details

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.RegisterForCustomerProvidedData(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.RegisterForCustomerProvidedDataRequest)
member.summary: Register to receive customer data with the Clover Loyalty API

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.SetCustomerInfo(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.SetCustomerInfoRequest)
member.summary: Set the Clover Loyalty API's current customer info

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ICloverConnector.SetLogLevel(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the current Log Level to filter log messages. Use constants from the LogLevel class for convenience.

member.name: T:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.LogLevel
member.summary: CloverConnector Log Level convenience constants

member.name: F:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.LogLevel.MINIMAL
member.summary: Minimal logging, only the most critical messages will be logged

member.name: F:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.LogLevel.MODERATE
member.summary: Moderate logging, basic flow information without logging excessive details

member.name: F:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.LogLevel.DETAILED
member.summary: Detailed logging, flow of information and relevant details

member.name: F:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.LogLevel.DEBUG
member.summary: Debug level logging of everything

member.summary: Contains merchant information about the device

member.name: T:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.BaseTransactionRequest
member.summary: Base Sale/Auth/Refund/PreAuth Transaction Request

member.name: P:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.BaseTransactionRequest.ExternalReferenceId
member.summary: The external reference id if associated with the payment

member.name: P:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.BaseTransactionRequest.PresentQrcOnly
member.summary: Present only the QR Code for Payment

member.name: T:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.TransactionRequest
member.summary: Extended Sale/Auth Transaction Request

member.name: T:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.PrintRequest
member.summary: This should be used for a print call.

members.member:
Create a PrintRequest to print a given Image
- Parameters: - image: Image to print - printRequestId: Optional identifier to give to the print job, so it can later be queried - printDeviceId: Optional identifier to speciy which printer to use

Create a PrintRequest to print an image at a given URL
- Parameters: - imageURL: URL to the image to print - printRequestId: Optional identifier to give to the print job, so it can later be queried - printDeviceId: Optional identifier to speciy which printer to use

Create a PrintRequest to print an array of strings to print
- Parameters: - text: Array of strings to be printed - printRequestId: Optional identifier to give to the print job, so it can later be queried - printDeviceId: Optional identifier to speciy which printer to use

Create an object used to inform the Clover Connector's `openCashDrawer()` function of required/additional information when requesting the cash drawer be opened
- Parameters: - reason: string describing the reason to open the drawer

member.name: T:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.SaleRequest
member.summary: This request should be used for a Sale call.

member.name: P:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.SaleRequest.DisableCashback
member.summary: If true then the cashback feature will not appear during the transaction

member.name: P:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.SaleRequest.TaxAmount
member.summary: Amount paid in tips

member.name: P:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.SaleRequest.TippableAmount
member.summary: Amount against which a tip should be applied

member.name: P:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.SaleRequest.AllowOfflinePayment
member.summary: If true then offline payments can be accepted

member.name: P:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.SaleRequest.ApproveOfflinePaymentWithoutPrompt
member.summary: If true then offline payments will be approved without a prompt. Currently must be true.

member.name: P:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.SaleRequest.TipAmount
member.summary: Gets or sets the tip amount.

member.name: P:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.SaleRequest.TipMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the tip mode, which controls when the tip is either designated by the customer, provided by the system as part of the request, or ommitted completely from the transaction

member.name: P:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.SaleRequest.ForceOfflinePayment
member.summary: If true then payments will be placed directly in the offline queue for processing when a valid connection exists to the gateway. This means that payments can be taken offline even with a healthy gateway connection, for purposes of keeping customer interaction with the payment device to the bare minimum. The merchant assumes all risk of potentially declined transactions when this feature is enabled.

member.name: T:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.SaleResponse
member.summary: Object passed in to an OnSaleResponse

member.name: T:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.VerifySignatureRequest
member.summary: Object passed in to VerifySignatureRequest. This must also be used to either accept or reject a signature as requested from the clover device.

member.name: T:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.AuthRequest
member.summary: This request should be used for Auth only, but is backward compatible for older implementations. If you are currently using an AuthRequest with IsPreAuth = true, please change your code to use PreAuthRequest/PreAuthResponse for all PreAuth transactions.

member.name: P:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.AuthRequest.TaxAmount
member.summary: Amount paid in tips

member.name: P:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.AuthRequest.TippableAmount
member.summary: Amount against which a tip should be applied

member.name: P:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.AuthRequest.AllowOfflinePayment
member.summary: If true then offline payments can be accepted

member.name: P:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.AuthRequest.ApproveOfflinePaymentWithoutPrompt
member.summary: If true then offline payments will be approved without a prompt. Currently must be true.

member.name: P:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.AuthRequest.ForceOfflinePayment
member.summary: If true then payments will be placed directly in the offline queue for processing when a valid connection exists to the gateway. This means that payments can be taken offline even with a healthy gateway connection, for purposes of keeping customer interaction with the payment device to the bare minimum. The merchant assumes all risk of potentially declined transactions when this feature is enabled.

member.name: T:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.AuthResponse
member.summary: Object passed in to OnAuthResponse

member.name: T:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.PreAuthRequest
member.summary: This request should be used for PreAuth transactions. If you are currently using an AuthRequest with IsPreAuth = true, please change your code to use PreAuthRequest/PreAuthResponse for all PreAuth transactions.

member.name: T:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.PreAuthResponse
member.summary: Object passed in to OnPreAuthResponse

member.name: P:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.PaymentResponse.Payment
member.summary: The payment from the sale

member.name: T:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CapturePreAuthRequest
member.summary: This request should be used for capturing payments obtained from a PreAuth response

member.name: T:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.IncrementPreAuthRequest
member.summary: Increments a previously made pre auth

member.name: P:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.IncrementPreAuthRequest.Amount
member.summary: The amount by which to increment the pre-auth.

member.name: P:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.IncrementPreAuthRequest.PaymentID
member.summary: The preauth to be incremented. This id should be pulled from the Payment.paymentId field in the PreAuthResponse.

member.name: T:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.IncrementPreAuthResponse
member.summary: The result of an attempt to increment a pre auth

member.summary: The resulting Authorization

member.name: T:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.ExternalDeviceState
member.summary: enum of current states of the Clover device. IDLE - device can handle new requests. Sale, CustomActivity, etc. BUSY - device will not response to new requests WAITING_FOR_POS - device is waiting for a response from the POS WAITING_FOR_CUSTOMER - device is waiting for the customer to take some action
